entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] AOT: `System.Text.Json.Tests` crashing inexplicably #89984
  • ProbabilisticMap and CompExactlyDependsOn #89979
  • Hide TypeInfo and references to it #89975
    9.0.0
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] [Out] arrays will free the 'original' elements in unmanaged to managed stubs when marshalling back to native callee #89968
    8.0.0
  • HttpListener on linux vulnerability #89983
  • [wasm] CI: runtime tests don't correctly use the runtime pack #89954
    9.0.0
  • MonoInterpreter doesn't correctly handle overshifting of a vector #89938
  • NativeAOT on Graviton2 As `armv8.2-a` Fails to Execute #89937
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89936
    9.0.0
  • Provide an API for configuring `JsonSerializerOptions` instances for reflection-based serialization. #89934
    8.0.0
  • NRE in encoders #89931
    9.0.0
  • JsonSerializer byte[] to stream nested base64 serialization #89929
  • `Type.GetCustomAttributes()` can be slow when not passing an `attributeType` parameter. #89928
  • GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte_Vector path in Ascii.Utility.cs is never exercised for AdvSimd/SSE4.1 #89924
  • Regex generator doesn't work when using statements only come from other generators #89923
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.TaskRunSyncTests outerloop tests fail on Mono on Linux MUSL #89921
    9.0.0
  • `potentialMatchingInterfaces != 0` assertion when compiling comparers #89918
  • [ios] Add support for multiple app bundles in the runtime pipeline for a test directory #89917
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ActivatorUtilitiesBenchmark #89944
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 268 Regressions on 7/29/2023 7:04:01 PM #89940
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 1 Regression on 7/26/2023 2:29:36 PM #89942
  • List<T> Insert() - optimize memory copying #89915
    Future
  • Compatibility issue with ProcessStartInfo with UseShellExecute=False and WindowStyle=Hidden #89910
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `DebuggerTests.MiscTests.DebuggerTests.MiscTests.TestDebugUsingMultiThreadedRuntime` failing #89909
    9.0.0
  • [OCSP Stapling] Cached bad response of Server-Side OCSP stabling in .NET7 Linux #89907
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Badly formatted stack trace with latest stable chrome (`115.*`) #89906
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Adjust Networking metrics to follow OpenTelemetry semantic conventions #89093
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Random blazor build failures in WBT - `error CS1001: Identifier expected` #86533
    9.0.0
  • Remove hardcoded TFM in wasm build files #79109
    8.0.0
  • Build race condition in src\tools\illink\src\ILLink.Tasks\ILLink.Tasks.csproj #89941
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.NETCore.App.Composite packaging misauthored - currently only win-x64 packages get published #72828
    8.0.0
  • `LocalBuilder.IsPinned` always returns `false` #89347
  • Proposal: obsolete or hide TypeInfo/GetTypeInfo #53217
    9.0.0
  • ECMA-335 clarification about assignable-to relation #68403
    Future
  • IStringArrayMarshallingFailsOutWindows fails on NativeAOT #89913
  • [API Proposal]: GC.RefreshMemoryLimit #70601
    8.0.0
  • [mono][iossimulator] Undefined globalization symbols for iossimulator-arm64 #89925
    8.0.0
  • [AOT][Blazor][Net8] String.ToLower performance issue #89735
    8.0.0
  • Offsets from first chance exception StackFrame are incorrect #89834
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 12/15/2021 7:57:48 PM #63455
    8.0.0
  • SslStream throws "RemoteCertificateNameMismatch" when using ipaddress as Sni for ssl handshake #89163
    8.0.0
  • MSB6006: "csc.dll" exited with code 143 #89820
    Future
  • Missing Microsoft.AspNetCore (.net 8) ARM Packages Blocking Build #89881
  • Test failure: System.Net.Http.Json.Functional.Tests.JsonContentTests_Async.JsonContentMediaTypeDefaultIfNull #89830
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: HttpMetricsTest_Http*.CurrentRequests_InstrumentEnabledAfterSending_NotRecorded #89451
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT builds aren't updated when rebuilding with different MSBuild options #88725
  • [browser][documentation] How-to add dotnet component into existing JavaScript application #80098
    8.0.0
  • MAUI iOS sample app size regression compared to .NET7 #79825
    9.0.0
  • Does HttpClientHandler Proxy Property Apply to CRL Checks? #89831
  • [API Proposal]: Add a `[System.IO.Path]` method to ensure that a relative path stays inside a directory #89785
  • outerloop crossgen2 access violation in jit.opt workitem #87305
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: ConsoleEncoding.TestEncoding - NotSupportedException : Memory stream is not expandable #73534
    8.0.0
  • Assert in System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.CompleteAcceptOperation #89806
    8.0.0
  • Roslyn source generator crash on mono/linux/arm64 #81123
    8.0.0
  • Starting App on iOS fails with System.ExecutingEngineException #80853
    8.0.0
  • switch on long ReadOnlySpan<char> is slower than string #89919
  • Uri constructor cannot parse http://hostname:port/ when hostname is * or + #77464
    8.0.0
  • [Android] Build failure: no previous prototype for function 'register_aot_modules' #89566
    8.0.0
  • [Uri] macOS localpath ucschars are still escaped #58504
    8.0.0
  • Configuration binding source generator fails to compile with CS8600 when using nullable reference types #89019
    8.0.0
  • Consider updating ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory to use ILEmit when possible #66153
    8.0.0
  • Implement Thread Abort second pass redirection on Unix #72703
    8.0.0
  • MyProject.GeneratedMSBuildEditorConfig.editorconfig' could not be found. Receiving error MSB6006: "csc.dll" exited with code 139 #87012
    8.0.0
  • Process.Modules does not include the main (entry) DLL on Linux #24768
    Future
  • [mono] Access Violation when running certain outerloop tests on Windows x86 #88992
    Future
  • GDB issue with BreakIfDebuggerPresent #5468
    Future
  • Allow EnC edit to add a method to an interface #11834
    Future
  • Test failure: Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_45929/test45929/test45929.sh #79662
    8.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/simple/ParallelCrash/ParallelCrash.sh #80357
    8.0.0
  • Cannot connect to a sql database using system.data.sqlclient and native aot win 64 publish #89782
  • Native AOT libraries for iOS and Android #89817
  • ilasm generating incorrect constant value #45419
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\OSR\\pinnedlocal\\pinnedlocal.cmd #83172
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • By value out fixes #89982
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Prefer vectorized ProbabilisticMap over Latin1CharSearchValues #89981
    area-System.Buffers
  • [wasm] Notify jiterpreter when a method is freed #89980
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • SPMI: Throw distinguished exception for recorded exceptions #89978
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup work #89976
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Exclude NETFramework targets file during source build #89974
    area-System.Resources
  • Add extension methods for creating OptionsBuilder with ValidateOnStart support #89973
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Update the event used for the tiered compilation background thread #89972
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Cleanup contents out #89971
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Move ThrowForHR to start of NotifyForSuccessFulInvoke #89970
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Make ImplementsInterfaceOfSelf more precise for canonical subtypes #89969
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve test failure messages #89967
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Revert "Disable MonitoringIsEnabled with issue 75302 (#75306)" #89966
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve performance in DI #89964
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/7.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Using "RollForward": major for BrowserDebugHost #89962
    Servicing-consider, area-Build-mono
  • [workloads] Use native arm64 aot compilers for iOS, tvOS, maccatalyst, and android where possible #89961
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Using "RollForward": major for BrowserDebugHost #89960
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Improve duplicate assembly resolving #89958
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [wasm] CI: Don't trigger non-wasm runtime tests when wasm-test-runner #89957
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [iOS] Generate unique class name for MonoDeadLetter #89956
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Delete dangling thread session states #89955
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Stop skipping tests in installer pipeline on linux_x64 #89953
    area-Host
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [browser] doc feedback #89951
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Improve reliability of HttpRequestError.NameResolutionError #89948
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [libs][Android] Filter out backwards timezones only with valid tzlookup file #89933
    os-android, area-System.DateTime
  • Change generation for NonGC objects for debugger #89927
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm][wbt] Split WBT classes to speed up CI job execution. #89926
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, needs-author-action
  • Fixed Enumerator variable null check #89920
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ocsp stapling] reject incorrect http response if the status code is not 2xx #89908
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging][wasm] runtime: Fix creating the stack trace for a ManagedError #89905
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Use the same tracked contexts for event pipe and ETW in nativeaot #89902
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [HTTP/2] Forward innerException's HttpRequestError to retryable HttpRequestException #89963
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [HTTP Metrics] Shorter version tags #89959
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT: Use project ids that are safe for use as identifiers #89945
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Remove hardcoded references to `net8.0` from WasmApp*targets #89699
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Dynamic events #89371
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix build race condition in ILLink.Tasks #89949
    needs-area-label
  • Remove Runtime composite package from being built. #89946
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix `LocalBuilder.IsPinned` always returning `false` on CoreCLR runtime #89411
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Hide IntrospectionExtensions.GetTypeInfo #89317
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Split off system libraries into a separate ItemGroup #89916
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Trigger a rebuild if ILC command line changes #89911
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Expect ThrowForHR to throw Exception on NativeAOT #89939
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Disable objc_msgSend stubs in clang #89932
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Pass through ComWrappers based objects to COM type descriptor #89887
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Adjust DNS metrics #89813
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Fix race condition in System.Net.Http.Json JsonSerializerOptions initialization. #89935
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add the interop tags to the "add to the AppModel project" automation #89221
    area-Meta
  • Fix isIPAdjusted setting during exception handling #89930
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • preserve TargetHostName even if we do not send it out via SNI #89289
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Adjust System.Net.Http metrics #89809
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Setup scheduled once a day runs rather than constant runs #89884
    area-Infrastructure
  • [PERF] Remove trigger completely to stabilize queues #89947
    area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #89814
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #89815
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/7.0-staging] Zlib: Add some protections to the allocator used by zlib #89532
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.11
  • [browser] high level documentation of WASM features #89469
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT: Fix up AppTest tests to fix missed testing cases #89833
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] macOS/iOS: Emit simple compact unwinding information #88724
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • fix Accept assert #89901
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.0
  • Tie llvm to emsdk's version #89865
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix BinSkim scan in nightly validation #89912
    needs-area-label
  • Disable failing outerloop tests and fix a build issue in MonoAOTCompiler #89922
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix binder gen nullability issue wrt binding ref type members #89900
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • For perf, use the new ConstructorInvoker APIs for ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #89573
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix deadlock during gcdump when using interp full AOT fallback. #89726
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix handling ThreadAbortException at the end of catch #89781
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix IsFixupPrecodeByASM and StubPrecode::IsStubPrecodeByASM #89899
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Specify callback calling convention for callbacks on Windows x86 causes crashes on Mono. #89571
    arch-x86, area-Interop-mono, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Improve zlib defenses on mono #89898
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [wasm] Fix condition to use latest chrome for testing #89890
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Rebaseline failing pri0 tests #89835
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Escape both CR and LF in IL disassembler #89886
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix failed to fetch debugger MT tests #89737
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix analysis issue in LDTOKEN dependencies #89757
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Clarifications in botr gc section #89888
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • Introducing TimeZoneInfo.GetSystemTimeZones(bool skipSorting) #89985
  • Use `StoreAligned` not `Store` in WidenAsciiToUtf16 #89892
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Make marshaller types specific to each scenario #89894
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Cleanup callee-allocated-only resources only if the call succeeds #89822
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add diagnostic when the size of an array that is marshalled to the callee is an 'out' parameter. #89827
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Add basic ICU tests #89771
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix host debug view not showing services before start #89610
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Added issue 78891 regression test #89876
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2235989 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Support breakpoints on AVX-512 instructions #89705
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Don't generate symbols if user doesn't want them #89840
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Convert.Try{From/To}HexString #86556
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution

  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #89303
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Don't fallback to PNSE, and give a more descriptive error message. #88804
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • Get DataContractSerializer to behave nicely with unloadable AssemblyLoadContext #88791
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • Add test for TypeIdentifierAttribute #89882
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement
  • Try to enable some JIT tests #89739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable IOPack, IOEnqueue, and IODequeue on Windows #88894
    area-System.Threading
  • Support nocheck prefix #81615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/6.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Using "RollForward": major for BrowserDebugHost #89003
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • POH allocation fix #86802
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter multithreading support #88279
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [WASM] Add ILStrip task to wasm app build process #88926
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser] app start benchmark fix, loadBootResource fix #89857
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • use approved SocketAddress API instead of direct internal access #89841
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.0
  • Add additional filter capabilities to dotnet-pgo tool. #89853
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • WIP: [mono] Support function pointer reflection introspection API #89712
    NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Make changes nescessary to build IL asm grammar with Bison. #89704
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use managed NTLM/SPNEGO on Apple platforms by default #89267
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Vector512 rightshift #89339
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 8.0.0
  • add test for SslClientAuthenticationOptions.ShallowClone #88557
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Add log level and keyword tests for NativeRuntimeEventSource #89816
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Store pinned static fields in the Pinned Object Heap. #89895
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Make casting logic closer to CoreCLR #89548
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0

    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-03
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • ManagedZLib: Console app for profiling inflate #2368
  • ManagedZLib: Porting Deflate from C ZLib #2367
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add support for non-HelloWasm test projects to `wasmjit-diff.ps1` #2366
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Init callback declaration #2364
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GenAPI does not correctly handle System.Runtime #34427
  • dotnet CLI: Consolidate `dotnet workload` command messages #34417
  • dotnet CLI: Allow cancellation for long-running commands #34416

Closed

  • dotnet nuget add source with credentials adds source to local Nuget.config but credentials to user #34437

PullRequests

Created

  • Automate the version label #34434
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support Records in GenAPI #34433
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • Rework of Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #34430
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Add back _RequiresILLinkPack override #34429
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Allow PublishSingleFile and PublishAot specified simultaneously #34419
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

Merged

  • When Hot Reload change fails to apply in the browser send full error … #33471
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • First pass at adopting CPM #34344
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add a concept of image family to container base image inference #33163
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Enable "portable" RID graph when targeting .NET 8 and higher #34279
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [draft] Containers: implementation of OAuth2 #34237
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add feature switch to control XmlResolver.IsNetworkingEnabledByDefault #34412
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.6.0 in /eng/dependabot #34199
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Enable transitive pinning #34387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #34404
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add test to test Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Tool install global command: Download tool packages from nuget when installing global tools #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #34379
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • First-run workload experience #34322
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Expression blocks #3086
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update collection-expressions.md #7418
  • Create CL-2023-08-03.md #7417

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [F12 GTD Source Link] F12 does not fall back to decompilation if Source Link/Embedded file lookup has exception. #69371
    17.8
  • Introduce abstraction for nullable options that fall back to feature flags #69367
  • NavigateTo tests fail on queue upgrade to 17.7P3 (from p2) #69364
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34003.103 #69363
  • AbstractSuppressionCodeFixProvider replaces LF with CRLF #69358
  • Code folding support for switch statement #69357

Closed

  • .NET 6 target isn't currently tested #69360
  • Add async `SourceText` APIs #61489
    Compiler.Next

PullRequests

Created

  • Source text writer encoding #69373
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #69372
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Adjust OptProf config #69370
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add assertions for length to StringTextWriter & LargeTextWriter #69369
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2235816 #69366
  • Do not offer 'use pattern matching' inside an expression tree #69362
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: emit Array.Empty<T>() for [] with target type T[] or IEnumerable<T> #69355
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Upgrade NuGet.Frameworks to fix loading projects with the 7.0.4xx SDK #69354
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Respect vscode codelens options to enable / disable #69352
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged
  • Soft-select "preselect" items if there's no filter text #69351
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Rationalize how temporary directory works today #68226
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue causing prepare tests to pass when it actually failed #69353
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue where we stale tagger tags could remain in a buffer (alternate approach) #69340
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB, OnDeckForServicing
  • Addrange on immutableArray creates a new ImmutableArray #69331
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix constraint cycle through nested type of base type #69242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Workaround issues with Uri escaping certain Unicode characters #69304
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for assembly/module-level `[Experimental]` and contextual suppression #69316
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Improve location that lambda errors are reported at. #69334
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for converting existing collection-initializers over to collection expressions. #69321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for switch-expressions #69194
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Improve EOL consistency for Add Using #69309
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Backlog
  • Add LanguageName to telemetry information passed in for CodeRefactoring_Delay and CodeFix_Delay telemetry calls #69350
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bump Razor to 7.0.0-preview.23402.2 #69306
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Verify synthesized `RequiresLocationAttribute` cannot be accessed by fnptrs #69328
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebApplicationBuilder throws DirectoryNotFoundException when wwwroot is empty but has links #49859
  • React to API review feedback for dotnet metrics in otel format #49857
  • CodeFixes triggered by cross file diagnostics don't work #49856
  • RDG throws at startup when combined with PublishAot and AuthorizationMiddleware #49855
  • InvalidOperationException: 'RemoteNavigationManager' already initialized. #49854
  • Blazor Web App is missing an error page #49853
    8.0-rc1
  • Perf improvement: json #49852
  • Migrate aspnetcore 2.1 code to dotnet/maintenance-packages #49851
  • Migrate Extensions 2.1 libraries to aspnetcore #49850
  • Investigate thread safety of GetReadOnlyTypeInfo and SystemTextJsonOutputFormatter #49849
  • Review behavior/rules for inheriting components with a RenderModeAttribute #49848
  • Create docs transport package before RC2 #49847
  • [Blazor] Add webassembly routing tests for the new features #49845
  • Add metadata types for form reading and mapping options #49844
    8.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Obsoleting TreeRouter in .NET 8.0 #49842
    8.0-rc2
  • In .Net7 Web API doesn't return multipart content #49841
  • ViewData in PageModel.Partial is not passed correctly #49838
  • "Adding `@ref` to a RenderFragment in C# - Seeking Guidance" #49839
    Discussions
  • Two forms on same page results in null ref #49821
  • DOMException: Failed to execute 'removeChild' on 'Node': The node to be removed is not a child of this node. #49820
    8.0-rc1
  • Rename Handler property on SupplyParameterFromForm to FormName #49819
    8.0-rc1
  • Add [SupplyParameterFromRoute] for Blazor #49817
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor Server-Side Rendering CORS issue with Microsoft.Identity.Web & Azure B2C #49814
    8.0-rc2

Closed

  • Restructure Blazor.Web template to split out client project #49412
    8.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Remove `suppress-error` from script #49053
    8.0-rc1
  • Router's NotFound content is never used in new Web project style #48983
    8.0-rc1
  • Default WebAssembly loading progress indicator doesn't apply in Blazor Web template #49056
    8.0-rc1
  • NavMenu toggler doesn't work in Blazor Web App #49556
    8.0-rc1
  • Final template refinements #49299
    8.0-rc1
  • Fix System.Security.Cryptography.Xml dependency #48033
    8.0-preview7
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, single_query #49781
  • Blazor add support for complex segments in routing #45401
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor support for default parameters in routes #45400
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Blazor] Add support for missing route constraints #45399
    .NET 8 Planning
  • "Missing" ARM packages in VS 2022 Preview 6? #49810
  • Blazor WASM - MarkupString rendering with line breaks #49806
  • AdditionalAssemblies not working properly in new version of Blazor Web App #49759
  • Can't configure HubOptions when calling IRazorComponentBuilder.AddServerComponents() #49300
    8.0-rc1
  • Imposible to update cached styles on production app with CSS Isolation. #49809
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot #49834
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot #49833
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #49832
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #49831
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #49830
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot #49829
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #49828
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #49827
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #49826
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #49825
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot #49824
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #49823
  • Attributes RequestSizeLimit and DisableRequestSizeLimit not working when using Authentication #49594
  • Blazor server memory leak occurs after page reloads #49773
  • What is minimum required version for Node JS to work with .NET 7 ? #49822
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #49807
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #49808
  • Quarantine UnauthorizedDirectWebSocketsConnectionDoesNotConnect #48961
  • Support Keyed Services in SignalR #49635
    8.0-rc1
  • Test Collection Cleanup Failure #49615

PullRequests

Created

  • Support view buffer-based rendering in Blazor #49860
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Improve auto render mode selection strategy #49858
    area-blazor
  • Don't pack Microsoft.Aspnetcore.Testing #49846

  • Update Nuget reference (by updating CodeAnalysis) #49843

  • Update Selenium drivers #49818

Merged

  • Add Keyed DI support to SignalR #49729

  • Improve ANCM file watcher thread management #49696
    feature-iis, area-networking, 8.0-rc1
  • Add VS Feedback link to bug report template list #49802
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Blazor Web template updates #49801
    area-blazor, feature-full-stack-web-ui, 8.0-rc1
  • [release/6.0] Move to MacOS 13 #49367
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.22
  • [Blazor] SSR unified routing #49622
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Support configuring hub options #49712
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc1
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware, 8.0-rc1
  • [RDG] Fix mismatched nullability for structs and HTTP method whitespace #49805
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-rc1
  • Unquarantine UnauthorizedDirectWebSocketsConnectionDoesNotConnect #49786
    area-signalr, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • Update template.json #49813
    area-mvc
  • [Blazor] Manual reflection based page discovery #49757
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2235787 #49575

  • fix: Account for form attribute on checkbox tag input helper #49201 #49323
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix text field generator with explicit value. #49608
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TableView cells disappear when cells are updated on Android #16533
  • ListView not change BackgroundColor when Theme is changed on iOS #16531
  • MAUI will not launch #16526

  • [Android] Error compiling in release mode #16523

  • [Windows] ListView inside Detail from FlyoutPage not rendering #16521
  • [Windows] Crash navigating using NavigationPage #16520
  • REOPEN [iOS] Type x:Double not found in xmlns http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2009/xaml #16519
  • [Android] Content is removed from page before animation during back navigation, when using NavigationPage #16518
  • Cannot register an Effect when using the templated PlatformEffect #16517
  • Unable to load the package dependencies in Xamarin forms and MAUI #16515
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.6.8686] [Android] BitmapFactory.DecodeStreamAsync crashes the app on .NET 8-preview.6 in Release mode #16514
    .NET 8 GA

Closed

  • Android: AppShell prevents gestures on native control #6553
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] Grid with a star and an empty auto column leads to an incorrect layout #16334
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] Incorrect layout when using a Grid with Star and Auto Columns with a child with HeightRequest placed in the Auto column #16368

    .NET 8 GA
  • about support linux #16529
  • Touchscreen not working after rapidly clicking while app startup #16251
  • MAUI: Xamarin.Android.Aapt2.targets(156,3): error : The file exists #16513
  • The CollectionView does not fit the item height on Windows. But is ok to Android. #16358
  • Visual Studio 17.7.0 Pre2 / Dotnet 8 8.0.100-preview.5.23303.2 / Maui 8.0.0-preview.5.8529 AvoidConstArraysAnalyzer NullReferenceException #15948
  • Padding: Error Cannot convert value "10 12" to "Microsoft.Maui.Thickness" #15852
  • [Windows, Blazor] Review currently failing Windows tests #16187
    8.0-rc2
  • Window glitches when dragging app between monitors with different scaling #11777
    .NET 8 GA
  • LineHeight, CharacterSpacing, TextDecorations property not working when Label is first displayed on iOS. #16204

  • iOS Debugger Indicates App Has Terminated Immediately #9056
    .NET 8 GA
  • Maui TabbedPage breaks in windows when navigating #12065
    Backlog
  • Flex Layout -> BindableLayout not working after ItemsSource changed in new vs preview version #9544
  • CollectionView not showing correctly inside AbsoluteLayout in iOS #15808
  • Button.LineBreakMode does not work on Windows #15828
    Backlog
  • .NET Maui 7 app crashes on iOS 17 #16316
  • Requesting permissions to access nearby WiFi devices on Android 13+ #13721
    Under Consideration
  • Hot-Reload Not Detecting XAML Changes #16267

PullRequests

Created

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve pruning to properly support ExecuteUpdate #31407
  • Allow ExecuteUpdate to update properties of multiple queries as long as the map to a single table #31406
    8.0.0
  • Meaningless queries should not have database queries #31405

Closed

  • Migrations: Differ doesn't use configured ValueComparer for DefaultValue #29420
    8.0.0-rc1
  • Allow ExecuteUpdate for entity splitting if all the properties being updated are in single table #28643
  • Stop instantiating Stopwatch #31347
    8.0.0
  • Use IN instead of EXISTS with ExecuteDelete and entity containment #31386
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Multiple entity support for ExecuteUpdate #31408

Merged

  • Migrations: Use comparer to diff default values #31396
  • Use IN instead of EXISTS in more places #31387
